title: WAT40B Demo
description:
How can you get the freshest, purest drinking water?  In this video we’re going to take a closer look at the WAT40B Pure Spring water dispenser from NewAir. 

The WAT40B is 100% BPA-free to provide pure, crisp clean drinking water.  Its bottom-loading feature makes it easy and convenient to replace the bottle. There’s a reliable child-safe lock on the hot water nozzle, and the drip tray is removable and dishwasher safe.

The WAT40B is UL and Energy Star Tested and approved. There’s even a switch to disable the hot and cold water so you can control your energy usage. The WAT40B also has a stainless steel water tank to provide crisp, clear clean tasting water. 

Thanks for checking out the WAT40B  Pure Spring water dispenser from NewAir.
